original: the course on high-performance and distributed computing for big data sets the basics for understanding and using advanced computing infraestructures to solve biomedical problems that use large amounts of data. this course is about the basic tools, programming languages and algorithmic techniques that are needed to develop software solutions that are scalable in parallel and distributed environments. the techniques cover the main algorithm design and analysis ideas for three major classes of machines: multicore and manycore shared memory machines, distributed memory machines like clusters and supercomputers, and cloud environments. techniques will be illustrated with representative problems from the biomedical fieldthis course is coordinated by universitat autònoma de barcelona, in collaboration with universitat de lleida.
translated_text: the course on high-performance and distributed computing for big data sets the basics for understanding and using advanced computing infrastructures to solve biomedical problems that use large amounts of data. this course is about the basic tools, programming languages and algorithmic techniques that are needed to develop software solutions that are scalable in parallel and distributed environments. the techniques cover the main algorithm design and analysis ideas for three major classes of machines: multicore and manycore shared memory machines, distributed memory machines like clusters and supercomputers, and cloud environments. techniques will be illustrated with representative problems from the biomedical fieldthis course is coordinated by universitat autònoma de barcelona, in collaboration with universitat de lleida.

original:
this course covers the study of the main concepts and algorithms for the
 analysis of complex networks, the models that summarize their most 
relevant properties, and the dynamics which take place on top of them. 
first, we show the presence of complex networks in all kinds of fields 
(biology, medicine, ecology, social sciences, economy, linguistics, etc.) and the existence of several properties that are common to most of them. we will classify complex networks according to different criteria, and explain their main structural characteristics at three levels of description: microscale, macroscale and mesoscale. these include from descriptors at the level of nodes (e.g., degree, clustering coefficient and centrality measures) to global properties of the network (e.g., degree distributions, small-world property, transitivity and assortativity), and also showing the appearance of intermediate mesoscopic structures (e.g., community structure, rich-club and motifs). we will also study the main 
models of complex networks, which allow the understanding of the 
appearance of their distinctive structural properties. finally, we will 
describe some of the dynamics on complex networks, such as 
diffusion, synchronization and epidemics spreading, and the analysis of the robustness of complex networks.
this course is coordinated by universitat rovira i virgili (dept. enginyeria informàtica i matemàtiques) in collaboration with universitat de barcelona (dept. física de la matèria condensada).
translated_text:
this course covers the study of the main concepts and algorithms for the
analysis of complex networks, the models that summarize their most
relevant properties, and the dynamics which take place on top of them.
first, we show the presence of complex networks in all kinds of fields
(biology, medicine, ecology, social sciences, economy, linguistics, etc.) and the existence of several properties that are common to most of them. we will classify complex networks according to different criteria, and explain their main structural characteristics at three levels of description: microscale, macroscale and mesoscale. these include from descriptors at the level of nodes (e.g., degree, clustering coefficient and centrality measures) to global properties of the network (e.g., degree distributions, small-world property, transitivity and assortativity), and also showing the appearance of intermediate mesoscopic structures (e.g., community structure, rich-club and motifs). we will also study the main
models of complex networks, which allow the understanding of the
appearance of their distinctive structural properties. finally, we will
describe some of the dynamics on complex networks, such as
diffusion, synchronization and epidemics spreading, and the analysis of the robustness of complex networks.
this course is coordinated by universitat rovira i virgili (dept. computer engineering and mathematics) in collaboration with universitat de barcelona (dept. condensed matter physics).

original: an integrative multidisciplinary approach in innovation and technology commercialization in business healthcare aimed at providing efficient and concrete view on how to approach innovation or science, evaluate it, and translate it into a relevant business concept. the concepts of entrepreneurship and the competencies, skills, experience and resources to pursue different entrepreneurial opportunities of the different tech sectors will be covered. moreover, this course will provide the students with an understanding of the fundamental financial and valuation techniques used by finance executives when evaluating the company's financial health and assessing the attractiveness of investment projects.this course is coordinated by université grenoble alpes.
translated_text: an integrative multidisciplinary approach in innovation and technology commercialization in business healthcare aimed at providing efficient and concrete view on how to approach innovation or science, evaluate it, and translate it into a relevant business concept. the concepts of entrepreneurship and the competencies, skills, experience and resources to pursue different entrepreneurial opportunities of the different tech sectors will be covered. moreover, this course will provide the students with an understanding of the fundamental financial and valuation techniques used by finance executives when evaluating the company's health financial and assessing the attractiveness of investment projects.this course is coordinated by université grenoble alpes.

original: the aims of this course are to provide students with basic principles and fundamentals on how to make good research works and how to manage research and development projects. therefore, the course has two main blocks. one devoted to the introduction of the scientific research methodology (rm), and the description of each one of the steps involved in the rm. furthermore, other features of research such as research dissemination, normative, ethical and social management of research will be analyzed. on the other hand, the other block is the project methodology (pm) where the main features of a research or/and development project management are presented, especially information technology (it) projects. concretely, main agile methodologies for project management will be described. in addition, the economical and exploitation aspects of project management will be analyzed.all these theoretical concepts will be practically implemented by the students in a research project on the biomedical data science field that must be managed and implemented following the learned methodologies in the course in an efficient and correct way.this course is coordinated by universitat politècnica de catalunya.
translated_text: the aims of this course are to provide students with basic principles and fundamentals on how to make good research works and how to manage research and development projects. thus, the course has two main blocks. one devoted to the introduction of the scientific research methodology (rm), and the description of each one of the steps involved in the rm. furthermore, other features of research such as research dissemination, normative, ethical and social management of research will be analyzed. on the other hand, the other block is the project methodology (pm) where the main features of a research or/and development project management are presented, especially information technology (it) projects. concretely, main agile methodologies for project management will be described. in addition, the economic and exploitation aspects of project management will be analyzed.all these theoretical concepts will be practically implemented by the students in a research project on the biomedical data science field that must be managed and implemented following the learned methodologies in the course in an efficient and correct way.this course is coordinated by the polytechnic university of catalonia.

original:
the main goal of this subject is to introduce the deep learning as a
 subset of machine learning, in terms of neural networks. we will show 
how these neural networks attempt to simulate the behaviour of the human
 brain—albeit far from matching its ability—allowing it to “learn” from 
large amounts of data. while a neural network with a single layer can 
still make approximate predictions, additional hidden layers can help to
 optimise and refine for accuracy.we will 
illustrate deep learning driving many artificial intelligence 
applications and services in healthcare that improve automation, 
performing analytical tasks without human intervention. we will show how
 neural networks are able to solve problems as medical image retrieval, 
classification, segmentation and analysis, and how these tasks can help 
health professionals to increase the quality of the patient care.this course is coordinated by universitat de barcelona (dept. mathematics and computer science).
translated_text:
the main goal of this subject is to introduce the deep learning as a
subset of machine learning, in terms of neural networks. we will show
how these neural networks attempt to simulate the behaviour of the human
brain—a far from matching its ability—allowing it to “learn” from
large amounts of data. while a neural network with a single layer can
still make approximate predictions, additional hidden layers can help to
optimise and refine for accuracy.we will
illustrate deep learning driving many artificial intelligence
applications and services in healthcare that improve automation,
performing analytical tasks without human intervention. we will show how
neural networks are able to solve problems as medical image retrieval,
classification, segmentation and analysis, and how these tasks can help
health professionals to increase the quality of the patient care.this course is coordinated by universitat de barcelona (dept. mathematics and computer science).

original:
this course on computational epidemiology explores the role of computational approaches in understanding and controlling infectious diseases. it begins with historical context, discussing past pandemics and how computational epidemiology has contributed to covid-19 response. it also outlines what topics won't be covered.
the heart of the course is devoted to various modeling techniques. we start with basic definitions of diseases and their types, then delve into compartmental models like the sir model and its variants. 
we then study the role of contact networks in disease spread, introducing network definitions and ways to model age structure. we'll examine epidemic spread in social networks through the heterogeneous mean field and the discrete-time markov chain approach.
spatial models of disease spread will be discussed, including metapopulation models, continuous models, and mentions of lattice models and cellular automata.
the impact of human behavior on disease spread is discussed through the aware-unaware model, and potential exploration of game theory models.
the course moves to control strategies, discussing vaccination and eradication thresholds, imperfect vaccines, targeted vaccination, and the use of quarantine.
estimation and inference are covered next, focusing on the basic reproduction number (r0). we will discuss how all estimations implicitly assume a model and demonstrate this using real-world examples. bayesian estimation of rt will also be addressed.
finally, surveillance methods are explored, including traditional and syndromic surveillance, and surrogate data sources like twitter, google flu trends, etc. the course concludes with brief discussions of stochastic simulations and agent-based modeling.
this course is coordinated by universitat rovira i virgili.
translated_text:
this course on computational epidemiology explores the role of computational approaches in understanding and controlling infectious diseases. it begins with historical context, discussing past pandemics and how computational epidemiology has contributed to covid-19 response. it also outlines what topics won't be covered.
the heart of the course is devoted to various modeling techniques. we start with basic definitions of diseases and their types, then delve into compartmental models like the sir model and its variants.
we then study the role of contact networks in disease spread, introducing network definitions and ways to model age structure. we'll examine epidemic spread in social networks through the heterogeneous mean field and the discrete-time markov chain approach.
spatial models of disease spread will be discussed, including metapopulation models, continuous models, and mentions of lattice models and cellular automata.
the impact of human behavior on disease spread is discussed through the aware-unaware model, and potential exploration of game theory models.
the course moves to control strategies, discussing vaccination and eradication thresholds, imperfect vaccines, targeted vaccination, and the use of quarantine.
estimation and inference are covered next, focusing on the basic reproduction number (r0). we will discuss how all estimations implicitly assume a model and demonstrate this using real-world examples. bayesian estimation of rt will also be addressed.
finally, surveillance methods are explored, including traditional and syndromic surveillance, and surrogate data sources like twitter, google flu trends, etc. the course concludes with brief discussions of stochastic simulations and agent-based modeling.
this course is coordinated by university rovira i virgili.

original:
in this course, students
would be introduced to the basics of text mining, natural language
processing (nlp), and their applications in the healthcare domain.
they would also learn about the different types of healthcare data
sources, including electronic health records (ehrs), clinical notes,
and scientific literature.
  
also,
an overview of applications of text mining in healthcare: in this
module, students would learn about various applications of text
mining in healthcare, including clinical decision support systems,
pharmacovigilance, patient outcome prediction, and population health
analysis.  
mention
of ethical and legal issues in healthcare text mining: this module
would cover ethical and legal issues related to the analysis of
healthcare data, including patient privacy, informed consent, and
data ownership.this course is coordinated by universitat politècnica de catalunya.
translated_text:
in this course, students
would be introduced to the basics of text mining, natural language
processing (nlp), and their applications in the healthcare domain.
they would also learn about the different types of healthcare data
sources, including electronic health records (ehrs), clinical notes,
and scientific literature.

also,
an overview of applications of text mining in healthcare: in this
module, students would learn about various applications of text
mining in healthcare, including clinical decision support systems,
pharmacovigilance, patient outcome prediction, and population health
analysis.
mention
of ethical and legal issues in healthcare text mining: this module
would cover ethical and legal issues related to the analysis of
healthcare data, including patient privacy, informed consent, and
data ownership.this course is coordinated by universitat politècnica de catalunya.

original:
the course on biomedicine for engineers sets basic concepts on 
biomedicine that are necessary in order to understand health data. the 
course will cover the understanding of the human genome, transcriptome 
and proteome and also the visualization, extraction and interpretation 
of biological data. in addition, the course will cover main concepts on 
cellular biology and histology, as well as on anatomy and physiology of 
the human systems.this course is coordinated by universitat de vic - universitat central de catalunya (dept. biociències i enginyeries).
translated_text:
the course on biomedicine for engineers sets basic concepts on
biomedicine that are necessary in order to understand health data.  the
course will cover the understanding of the human genome, transcriptome
and also the visualization, extraction and interpretation
of biological data. in addition, the course will cover main concepts on
cellular biology and histology, as well as on anatomy and physiology of
the human systems.this course is coordinated by vic university - central university of catalonia (dept. biosciences and engineering).

original: el temari abasta fonaments de càlcul relacionats amb nombres reals i complexos; i: límits, continuïtat, derivació i integració, de funcions reals d'una variable real.
translated_text: the syllabus covers basics of calculus related to real and complex numbers; and: limits, continuity, derivation and integration, of real functions of a real variable.

original:
l'assignatura pretén
aprofundir en els coneixements teòrics bàsics relacionats amb l'orientació de
l'estudiant davant la seva formació acadèmica i la seva inserció laboral,
acompanyant aquests coneixements d'experiències pràctiques.
translated_text:
the subject aims to
deepening basic theoretical knowledge related to orientation
the student before his academic training and his employment,
accompanying these knowledge of practical experiences.

original:
aquesta assignatura presenta el model de programació orientada a 
objectes i aprofundeix en les tècniques de programació estudiades en el 
curs anterior.
translated_text:
this subject presents the programming model oriented to
objects and deepens the programming techniques studied in the
previous year.

original:
proporcionar a l’alumne el coneixement de les eines i els 
algorismes per a generar gràfics i poder interaccionar amb ells. 
l'assignatura té un enfoc pràctic.
translated_text:
to provide the student with knowledge of the tools and
algorithms to generate graphics and interact with them.
the subject has a practical approach.

original:
la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes 
presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa. qualsevol canvi 
s’informara a l’espai moodle de cada assignatura.
translated_text:
the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to classes
face-to-face and can serve as an orientation guide. any change
it was reported in the moodle space of each subject.

original: s'estudiaran l'aritmètica i l'àlgebra discreta i en general les eines matemàtiques necessàries per a les comunicacions digitals. en particular s'estudiaran els codis de control d'errors.
translated_text: arithmetic and discrete algebra will be studied and in general the mathematical tools needed for digital communications. in particular, error control codes will be studied.

original: els llenguatges formals són un component fonamental del camp de la informàtica. en aquest curs introduirem els tipus de llenguatges formals i practicarem tècniques i eines per processar-los. això servirà de base per introduir-nos en els fonaments de la calculabilitat i de la complexitat, així com dels processadors de llenguatges formals.
translated_text: formal languages are a fundamental component of the field of computer science. in this course we will introduce the types of formal languages and practice techniques and tools to process them. this will serve as the basis for introducing us to the foundations of computational and complexity, as well as formal language processors.

original:
1. comprendre els fonaments bàsics de les funcions de varies variables.
2. comprendre la gènesi i fonaments de les equacions diferencials ordinàries.
3. comprendre geomètrica i formalment els conceptes d'integral doble i triple.
translated_text:
1. understand the basics of the functions of several variables.
2. understand the genesis and foundations of ordinary differential equations.
3. comprehend geometrically and formally the concepts of double and triple integrals.

original:
proporcionar a l’alumne el coneixement de les eines i els 
algorismes per a generar gràfics i poder interaccionar amb ells. 
l'assignatura té un enfoc pràctic.
translated_text:
to provide the student with knowledge of the tools and
algorithms to generate graphics and interact with them.
the subject has a practical approach.

original: estimular i facilitar el contacte de l'alumne amb el món laboral per complementar-ne la formació i facilitar-ne la posterior inserció.el taller d’orientació professional és obligatori per aprovar l’assignatura per tots els alumnes de grau matriculats.
translated_text: to stimulate and facilitate the student's contact with the working world to complement their training and facilitate their subsequent insertion.

original: el correcte flux d'informació a les organitzacions resulta molt important per el seu adequat funcionament. en aquesta assignatura estudiem els sistemes de documentació, comunicació i emmagatzematge. fem especial atenció a  la importància de la informació en els processos de gestió. finalment, l'assignatura també toca temes relacionats amb la gestió de la informació en entorns específics.
translated_text: the correct flow of information to organizations is very important for its proper functioning. in this subject we study the systems of documentation, communication and storage. we pay particular attention to the importance of information in management processes. finally, the subject also touches topics related to information management in specific environments.

original: introducció a l'estructura, disseny i implementació de compiladors. s'estudien les parts frontal i dorsal dels compiladors, així com eines bàsiques per la generació d'analitzadors lèxics i sintàctics.
translated_text: introduction to the structure, design and implementation of compilers. the front and dorsal parts of the compilers are studied, as well as basic tools for generating lexical and syntactic analysers.

original: introducció als conceptes i les tècniques bàsiques de la intel·ligència artificial.
translated_text: introduction to the basic concepts and techniques of artificial intelligence.

original:
es pretén que els alumnes tinguin una visió completa de les 
possibilitats de la programació web, de les arquitectures orientades a 
serveis (soa) i de la gestió de dades. l'assignatura tindrà un marcat 
caràcter pràctic incidint en l'aplicabilitat de les tecnologies 
explicades.
translated_text:
it is intended that students have a complete vision of the students
possibilities of web programming, architecture oriented to
services (sound) and data management. the subject will have a marked
practical character inciding on the applicability of technologies
explained.

original: l’aprenentatge automàtic és un camp dinàmic dins de la intel·ligència artificial (ia) que permet als sistemes aprendre de les dades i prendre decisions amb la mínima intervenció humana. això és possible gràcies a l’ús d’algorismes que analitzen patrons dins de les dades i generalitzen aquests patrons per aplicar-los a noves dades. en aquest curs es mostraran els principals tipus de problemes que es poden analitzar amb aprenentatge automàtic, com es preprocessen les dades, quins són els principals mètodes d'aprenentatge automàtic supervisat i no supervisat, com es fonamenten matemàticament, i com s'avalua la qualitat dels resultats.
translated_text: machine learning is a dynamic field within artificial intelligence (i) that allows systems to learn from data and make decisions with minimal human intervention. this is possible thanks to the use of algorithms that analyze patterns within the data and generalize these patterns to apply them to new data. this course will show the main types of problems that can be analyzed with machine learning, how data are processed, what are the main methods of supervised and unsupervised machine learning, how they are mathematically based, and how the quality of the results is evaluated.

original: l’assignatura d’algorítmica pertany a l’especialitat de computació del grau d’enginyeria informàtica que s'imparteix al primer semestre del darrer curs. en aquesta assignatura estudiarem els principals esquemes algorítmics per resoldre problemes computacionals complexos. per poder fer-ho, s’introdueix també l’anàlisi matemàtic d’algoritmes i es presenten les eines per calcular el seu cost, contemplant el (de vegades difícil) equilibri entre costos espacials (memòria) i temps (còmput). aquestes bases s’utilitzen per estudiar i analitzar el disseny i les diferents implementacions de diversos algoritmes, sovint associats a estructures de dades fonamentals (piles, cues, arbres, grafs, etc.).
translated_text: the algorithmic subject belongs to the computer science degree that is taught in the first semester of the last course. in order to do so, mathematical analysis of algorithms is introduced and tools are presented to calculate their cost, contemplating the (sometimes difficult) balance between spatial costs (memory) and time (comput). these bases are used to study and analyze the design and implementations of various algorithms, often associated with fundamental data structures (piles, tails, trees, graphs, etc.).

translated_text: the algorithmic subject belongs to the computer science degree that is taught in the first semester of the last course. in order to do so, mathematical analysis of algorithms is introduced and tools are presented to calculate their cost, contemplating the (sometimes difficult) balance between spatial costs (memory) and time (comput). these bases are used to study and analyze the design and implementations of various algorithms, often associated with fundamental data structures (piles, tails, trees, graphs, etc.)

original: aquesta assignatura té com a objectiu que l’alumne aprengui a desenvolupar aplicacions web complexes fent servir frameworks actuals tant al front-end (per exemple, react), com al back-end (per exemple, nodejs-express i spring boot). l’alumne també aprendrà a fer servir diversos mètodes de persistència de dades (per exemple, bases de dades com mongodb o firebase). finalment, l’alumne veurà metodologies de treball directament relacionades amb el desenvolupament d’aplicacions web.although this course is not offered in english, foreign exchange students will receive personalised support in english and will be able to develop the evaluation activities in this language.
translated_text: this subject aims to learn how to develop complex web applications using current frameworks on both the front-end (e.g. react), and back-end (e.g. nodejs-express and spring boot). the student will also learn to use various data persistence methods (e.g. databases such as mongodb or firebase). finally, the student will see working methodologies directly related to the development of web applications.although this course is not offered in english, foreign exchange students will receive personalized support in english and will be able to develop the evaluation activities in this language.

original: la computació ubiqua fa referència a la integració natural de la tecnologia informàtica en la vida quotidiana, fent possible la creació d'entorns intel·ligents. en aquesta assignatura, estudiem els fonaments dels sistemes de computació ubiqua, des de la recollida de dades amb sensors i la iot fins a la interacció humana amb aquests sistemes. l'assignatura cobreix tant les bases teòriques com les aplicacions pràctiques, on els estudiants dissenyaran i implementaran sistemes ubiqües.l'assignatura s'impartirà en català, tot i que els materials poden estar en anglès.
translated_text: ubiqua computing refers to the natural integration of computer technology in everyday life, making it possible to create intelligent environments. in this subject, we study the fundamentals of ubiquitous computing systems, from data collection with sensors and yacht to human interaction with these systems. the subject covers both theoretical bases and practical applications, where students will design and implement ubiquious systems. the subject will be taught in catalan, although materials may be in english.

translated_text: although this course is not offered in english, foreign exchange students will receive personalized support in english and will be able to develop the assessment activities in this language.

original:
metodologies i tècniques de programació d'aplicacions per a dispositius 
mòbils i sistemes encastats (embedded).aquesta assignatura s'imparteix 
íntegrament en anglès.
translated_text:
methodologies and application programming techniques for devices
mobile and embedded systems. this subject is taught
in english.
Error in translation request

original: estudi de les arquitectures multiprocessador de memòria compartida i distribuïda (mmc,mmd), aprofundint en les tècniques específiques per a la seva programació eficient. identificació dels factors que intervenen en el rendiment dels sistemes multiprocessadors. desenvolupament d'aplicacions paral·leles eficients (paral·lelització de programes seqüencials i paral·lelització de bucles). estudi i utilització pràctica del model estàndard de programació de memòria compartida openmp i mpi per al desenvolupament d'aplicacions paral·leles.
translated_text: study of shared and distributed memory multiprocessor architectures (mmc,mmd), deepening specific techniques for efficient programming. identification of the factors involved in the performance of multiprocessor systems. developing efficient parallel applications (parallelization of sequential programs and loop parallelization). practical study and use of the standard model of shared memory programming openmp and mpi for the development of parallel applications.

original:
l'objectiu principal de l'assignatura és adquirir la capacitat per a
planificar, desplegar elements robòtics en qualsevol àmbit
laboral.per a això és
fonamental conèixer tots els aspectes relacionats amb la morfologia i capacitats dels diferents tipus de robots, i
aplicar-los als diferents sectors productius i serveis.així
mateix, se'ls introdueix en els principals estàndards professionals de la robòtica, amb la voluntat que a la seva carrera professional puguin
aprofundir més en la temàtica, podent arribar fins i tot a professionalitzar-se
en aquest camp.
amb aquesta
aproximació es pretén que els alumnes obtinguin una visió professional i de
futur de la robòtica actual així com les possibilitats futures. les temàtiques a tractar a l'assignatura son :• introducció a la robòtica. evolució i tendències.• morfologia dels robots.• navegació i localització.• robòtica i entorn.• aplicacions de la robòtica.
translated_text:
the main objective of the subject is to acquire the capacity for
plan, deploy robotic elements in any field
for this is
fundamental to know all aspects related to the morphology and capabilities of different types of robots, and
apply them to different productive sectors and services.
they are introduced to the main professional standards of robotics, with the will that in their professional career they can be
deepen more in the subject, being able to become more professional.
in this field.
with this
approach is intended for students to get a professional and professional vision
future of current robotics as well as future possibilities. the subject is:• introduction to robotics. evolution and trends.• robots morphology.• navigation and location.• robotics and surroundings.• robotics applications.

original:
metodologies i tècniques de programació d'aplicacions per a dispositius 
mòbils i sistemes encastats (embedded).aquesta assignatura s'imparteix 
íntegrament en anglès.
translated_text:
methodologies and application programming techniques for devices
mobile and embedded systems. this subject is taught
in english.

original:
l’assignatura ha de servir per a introduir als alumnes els conceptes 
bàsics i la pràctica de la interacció persona-ordinador. inclou com el 
factor humà afecta a la interacció, quins són els principals dispositius
 per a la interacció, fonaments de disseny de sistemes interactius, 
introducció a l'accessibilitat i avaluació de la usabilitat i 
l'accessibilitat.(idioma: cas)
translated_text:
the subject must serve to introduce students the concepts
basic and the practice of human-computer interaction. it includes how the
human factor affects interaction, which are the main devices
for interaction, design foundations for interactive systems,
introduction to accessibility and evaluation of usability and
accessibility.(language: case)

original:
identificació de la problemàtica existent en el desenvolupament 
d'aplicacions de temps real crític sobre sistemes físics. estudi de les 
eines de programació de sistemes de temps real definides a l'estàndard 
posix. aplicació pràctica dels conceptes teòrics mitjançant 
implementació d'aplicacions de temps real crític utilitzant sistemes 
operatius de temps real com podrien ser: mbed, chibios/rt, xenomai, 
real-time linux, qnx,... sobre plataformes físiques reals com: st nucleo
 o raspberry pi.
translated_text:
identification of the existing problem in development
critical real-time applications on physical systems. study of the
real-time systems programming tools defined in the standard
put it. practical application of theoretical concepts by
implementation of critical real-time applications using systems
real-time operatives such as: mbed, chibios/rt, xenomai,
real-time linux, qnx,... on real physical platforms such as: st nucleo
raspberry pi.

original: introducció als conceptes i les tècniques bàsiques de la intel.ligència artificial (ia).
translated_text: introduction to the basic concepts and techniques of artificial intelligence (ia).

original:
iniciar a l’alumne en la programació d'aplicacions. introduir els 
elements i tècniques per a dissenyar programes simples. experimentar els
 conceptes amb l'ajuda de casos pràctics.
translated_text:
to start the student in application programming. introduce the
elements and techniques to design simple programs. experiment with
concepts with the help of practical cases.

original:
l'assignatura proporciona els coneixements necessaris per tal de 
comprendre i descriure el cos humà com una unitat estructural, orgànica i
 funcional on s'interrelacionen els diferents aparells i sistemes en 
condicions de salut. a més, facilita l'adquisició de les habilitats 
necessàries per a la realització de determinades exploracions funcionals i
 el desenvolupament de tècniques de laboratori.						
en el cas que es produeixi alguna circumstància que impliqui un canvi en les característiques de la docència i/o de l’avaluació, s'informarà a través de l’espai moodle de l'assignatura.
translated_text:
the subject provides the necessary knowledge in order to
understanding and describing the human body as a structural, organic and
functional where different devices and systems are interrelated
health conditions. it also facilitates the acquisition of skills
necessary to carry out certain functional explorations and
the development of laboratory techniques.
if there is any circumstance that involves a change in the characteristics of teaching and/or evaluation, it will be informed through the moodle space of the subject.

original: l'enginyeria tissular constitueix un conjunt de coneixements, tècniques i mètodes de base biotecnològica que permeten dissenyar i generar al laboratori substituts tissulars, teixits artificials o constructes d'origen heteròleg o autòleg a partir de cèl·lules mare, cultius cel.lulars i biomaterials. l'enginyeria tissular constitueix un enorme avenç per a la teràpia cel·lular i la medicina regenerativa.aquesta assignatura ofereix una visió integrativa dels reptes de reparació i regeneració que presenten els diferents teixits del cos humà i els avenços científics i biomèdics emergents en medicina regenerativa per millorar la qualitat de la resposta cel·lular i tissular.l'objectiu d'aprenentatge d'aquesta assignatura és comprendre els fonaments de les teràpies cel·lulars, els fonaments d'enginyeria de teixits i la histologia dels teixits bàsics del cos humà (nerviós, connectiu, muscular i epitelial). com a pas previ per adquirir competències en l'elaboració de materials biocompatibles i el disseny de solucions per a problemes de salut mitjançant tècniques d'enginyeria per reparar reemplaçar o millorar òrgans/teixits.aquesta assignatura s'imparteix en català. les fonts d'informació i els recursos d'aprenentatge estan disponibles en diferents idiomes.
translated_text: tissue engineering constitutes a set of knowledge, techniques and methods of biotechnological base that allow the laboratory to design and generate tissue substitutes, artificial tissues or constructs of heterologist or autologist origin from stem cells, cell cultures and biomaterials. tissue engineering constitutes an enormous breakthrough for cellular therapy and regenerative medicine. this subject offers an integrative view of the challenges of repair and regeneration that present the different tissues of the human body and emerging scientific and biomedical advances in regenerative medicine to improve the quality of cellular and tissue response. the aim of learning this subject is to understand the foundations of cellular therapies, the foundations of tissue engineering and the histology of the basic tissues of the human body (nervous, connective, muscular and epithelial). as a previous step to acquire competences in the development of biocompatible materials and the design of solutions for health problems through engineering techniques to repair or replace organs/wovens. this subject is taught in catalan. information sources and learning resources are available in different languages.

original:
la informàtica (cs) i la intel·ligència artificial (ia) s’estan 
incorporant als centres assistencials per a un millor tractament dels 
pacients. les tecnologies de la base de dades i les bases de coneixement
 són el nucli d’aquesta revolució.
en aquest curs, introduirem alguns dels estàndards més rellevants per a 
la codificació de dades clíniques, estructuració de dades, registres de 
salut electrònics i anotació semàntica. a més, el curs introduirà 
nocions sobre anàlisi de dades, representació i gestió de coneixements 
en medicina i presentarà sistemes de suport a decisions i tècniques 
d’intel·ligència artificial en medicina. el curs conclou amb nocions 
d'ètica i seguretat en la informàtica mèdica.
translated_text:
computer science (cs) and artificial intelligence (ia) are being
incorporating healthcare facilities for better treatment
patients. database technologies and knowledge bases
are the core of this revolution.
in this course, we will introduce some of the most relevant standards for
the encoding of clinical data, data structuring, records
electronic health and semantic annotation. in addition, the course will introduce
notions about data analysis, representation and knowledge management
in medicine and will present systems to support decisions and techniques
artificial intelligence in medicine. the course concludes with notions
ethics and security in medical computer science.
Error in translation request

original:
la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes
presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa. a causa de l’emergència sanitària
provocada per la covid-19 poden haver-hi canvis en la docència, avaluació i
calendaris del curs. aquests canvis s’informaran a l’espai moodle de cada assignatura.
translated_text:
the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to classes
face-to-face and can serve as an orientation guide. due to the health emergency
caused by covid-19 there may be changes in teaching, evaluation and
calendars of the course. these changes will be informed in the moodle space of each subject.

original:
la física mèdica és la part de la física que comprèn l’aplicació dels conceptes, lleis, models, agents i mètodes propis de la física en la prevenció, diagnòstic i tractament de les malalties, desenvolupant una important funció en l’assistència mèdica, en la investigació biomèdica i en l’optimització d’algunes activitats sanitàries.

l’assignatura de física mèdica avançada per al grau d’enginyeria biomèdica té com a objectiu proporcionar als alumnes els fonaments físics la base científica per a la comprensió de les modernes tecnologies del diagnòstic mèdic i de les principals tècniques terapèutiques, així com establir els criteris per a la correcta utilització dels agents físics emprats en medicina.
translated_text:
medical physics is the part of physics comprising the application of the concepts, laws, models, agents and methods of physics in the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of diseases, developing an important role in medical care, biomedical research and the optimization of some health activities.

the subject of advanced medical physics for the degree of biomedical engineering aims to provide students with the physical foundations the scientific basis for understanding modern technologies of medical diagnosis and the main therapeutic techniques, as well as establishing the criteria for the correct use of physical agents employed in medicine.
Error in translation request

original: estimular i facilitar el contacte de l'alumne amb el món laboral per complementar la seva formació i facilitar la seva posterior inserció.el taller d’orientació professional és obligatori per aprovar l’assignatura per tots els alumnes de grau matriculats
translated_text: stimulate and facilitate the contact of the student with the working world to complement their training and facilitate their subsequent insertion.the professional orientation workshop is required to approve the subject for all undergraduate students enrolled

original: conceptes bàsics de teoria de circuits i de sistemes lineals invariants. anàlisi de circuits resistius. anàlisi de sistemes lineals de temps continu amb transformada de laplace. anàlisi de circuits en règim transitori i en règim permanent sinusoïdal.
translated_text: basic concepts of circuit theory and linear invariant systems. resistive circuit analysis. analysis of linear systems of continuous time with laplace transform. analysis of circuits in transitional regime and in permanent sinusoidal regime.

original: l'assignatura pretén donar els fonaments teòrics que integren el sistema conceptual de l'empresa, i pròpiament els relacionats amb l'administració d'empreses. en aquest sentit s'analitza la relació de les organitzacions amb el seu entorn, s'estudien les funcions directives i es fa una anàlisi detallada de algunes àrees funcionals que serveix com a introducció perquè en el futur l'alumne avanci en el coneixement de la gestió empresarial. amb tot això es pretén que l’alumnat dels ensenyaments d'enginyeria que en finalitzar els seus estudis s'incorpori a qualsevol empresa, organització o altres classes d'institucions ho facin amb el bagatge suficient per tal de poder fer front als requeriments que exigeixen les organitzacions modernes.
translated_text: the subject aims to give the theoretical foundations that make up the conceptual system of the company, and properly those related to the management of companies. in this sense, the relationship of organizations with their environment is analyzed, the management functions are studied and a detailed analysis of some functional areas is made that serves as an introduction because in the future the student advances in the knowledge of business management. with all this it is intended that students of the engineering teachings that at the end of their studies are incorporated into any company, organization or other classes of institutions do so with sufficient baggage in order to meet the requirements demanded by modern organizations.

original:
aquesta assignatura és una introducció a l'estudi de l'organització cel•lular, tant en els seus aspectes estructurals com els funcionals. l'objectiu principal és que l'alumne adquireixi una base conceptual i pràctica sobre els fenòmens cel•lulars que li permetin, més endavant, comprendre el fonament bioquímic dels processos cel•lulars i les seves aplicacions biotecnològiques. 
tots aquests coneixements estan estructurats en quatre blocs temàtics: introducció a la biologia cel•lular, citologia, cicle i desenvolupament cel•lular.
translated_text:
this subject is an introduction to the study of cellular organization, both in its structural and functional aspects. the main objective is that the student acquires a conceptual and practical basis on cellular phenomena that allow him to understand the biochemical foundation of cellular processes and their biotechnological applications.
all these knowledge is structured in four thematic blocks: introduction to cellular biology, cytology, cycle and cellular development.

original: l'objectiu d'aquesta assignatura és presentar a l'alumne un marc de referència analític per a l'estudi de senyals i sistemes de naturalesa contínua. sobre aquesta base es pretén introduir una sèrie de conceptes i tècniques d'especial rellevància pràctica en el processament de senyal, aplicables a un tipus específic de sistemes: els sistemes lineals invariants en el temps (sistemes lit).
translated_text: the objective of this subject is to present to the student an analytical frame of reference for the study of signals and systems of continuous nature. it is intended to introduce a series of concepts and techniques of special practical relevance in signal processing, applicable to a specific type of systems: time-invariant linear systems (lit systems).

original:
aquesta assignatura és una introducció a les tecnologies òmiques i al 
seu ús per estudiar procesos biològics. l'objectiu principal és que 
l'alumne adquireixi una base conceptual i pràctica sobre tecnologies 
genòmiques, transcriptòmiques, proteòmiques i metabolòmiques. 
experimentar els conceptes amb l'ajuda de casos pràctics i l'anàlisis de
 dades.l'assignatura s'impartirà en català i/o castellà. les diapositives seran en anglés.
translated_text:
this subject is an introduction to omic technologies and to
its use to study biological processes. the main objective is that
the student acquires a conceptual and practical basis on technologies
genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics and metabolomics.
experience concepts with the help of practical cases and analysis of
the subject will be taught in catalan and/or spanish. the slides will be in english.

original: en l'assignatura de processament digital del senyal primer es tracta el tema de la conversió analògica digital. les següents classes es dedicaran a presentar tota la teoria matemàtica que descriu la dinàmica tant de les senyals com dels sistemes digitals. finalment, es tractarà el tema de disseny de sistemes digitals a traves de les técniques de disseny de filtres fir i iir.
translated_text: in the digital processing subject of the signal is the subject of digital analog conversion. the following classes will be dedicated to presenting all the mathematical theory that describes the dynamics of both signals and digital systems. finally, the theme of digital systems design will be discussed through the techniques of fir and iir filter design.

original: l'objectiu de l'assignatura és conèixer el funcionament d'internet i les xarxes de dades. aporta uns coneixements i habilitats generals sobre el funcionament de conceptes i tecnologies rellevants en la societat de la informació. per als estudiants d'enginyeria informàtica i els de telecomunicacions, la "cultura general" que aporta l'assignatura és essencial per poder desplegar serveis web i de telecomunicacions, o per treballar en la seguretat informàtica. també us aporta els coneixements bàsics per facilitar-vos futures acreditacions en tecnologies de xarxa. pels estudiants d'enginyeria biomèdica proporciona els coneixements necessaris per fer desplegaments de maquinari i programari per a l'àmbit de la salut en entorns reals (on, al capdavall, hi ha xarxes i servidors). els estudiants de telecomunicacions disposeu d'assignatures sobre transmissió de senyals, antenes, tecnologies òptiques, etc. que en aquesta assignatura no abordem.
translated_text: the aim of the subject is to know the functioning of the internet and data networks. it provides general knowledge and skills about the functioning of relevant concepts and technologies in the information society. for students in computer engineering and telecommunications, the "general culture" that the subject provides is essential to deploy web and telecommunications services, or to work in computer security. it also gives you the basic knowledge to facilitate future accreditations in network technologies. for biomedical engineering students it provides the necessary knowledge to make hardware and software deployments for the health field in real environments (where, after all, there are networks and servers). telecommunications students have assignments on signal transmission, antennae, optical technologies, etc. that in this subject we do not address.

original: aquesta assignatura és una introducció al modelatge i anàlisi de dades biomèdiques obtingudes a partir de tecnologies òmiques. l'objectiu principal és que l'alumne sàpiga analitzar dades òmiques des  de un punt de vista de sistemes i sàpiga generar models predictius a partir d'aquestes. també experimentarà els conceptes amb l'ajuda de casos pràctics.
translated_text: this subject is an introduction to modeling and analysis of biomedical data obtained from omic technologies. the main objective is that the student knows how to analyze omic data from a system point of view and knows how to generate predictive models from them. he will also experience concepts with the help of practical cases.

original: aquesta assignatura inicia l'estudiant en el processament d'imatges biomèdiques. començarem pels conceptes fonamentals relatius als formats d'imatge digital, continuarem amb l'estudi dels algoritmes de processament d'imatge més bàsics per concloure amb mètodes multivariants més avançats. es donarà un enfocament orientat a la imatge biomèdica.
translated_text: this subject initiates the student in the processing of biomedical images. we will begin with the fundamental concepts relating to digital image formats, we will continue with the study of the most basic image processing algorithms to conclude with more advanced multivariant methods. a biomedical image-oriented approach will be given.

original: la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa. coneixement de les tècniques bàsiques de l’àlgebra lineal.
translated_text: the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to face-to-face classes and can serve as an orientation guide. knowledge of the basic techniques of linear algebra.

original:
1. comprendre els fonaments bàsics de les funcions de varies variables.
2. comprendre la gènesi i fonaments de les equacions diferencials ordinàries.
3. comprendre geomètrica i formalment els conceptes d'integral doble i triple.
translated_text:
1. understand the basics of the functions of several variables.
2. understand the genesis and foundations of ordinary differential equations.
3. comprehend geometrically and formally the concepts of double and triple integrals.

original: la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa. les activitats docents s’impartiran tal com apareixen programa de l’agenda acadèmica. en quant a les classes teòriques, s'impartiran en català i els temes es desenvoluparan en un format de classe magistral tradicional. pel que fa les classes pràctiques, també s'impartiran en català i els continguts es desenvoluparan en forma de seminaris amb diversos mòduls d’exploracions complementàries. l’assistència d’aquests seminaris és obligatòria i condició indispensable per poder presentar-se a l'examen de continguts pràctics.en el cas que l’evolució de la situació sanitària ho requereixi, es procurarà adaptar l'activitat docent i l'avaluació a les directrius que estableixin els organismes pertinents i s'informarà d'aquestes adaptacions a l’espai moodle de l'assignatura.
translated_text: the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to face-to-face classes and can serve as an orientation guide. teaching activities will be given as the program of the academic agenda appears. in terms of theoretical classes, they will be taught in catalan and the subjects will be developed in a traditional master class format. practical classes will also be taught in catalan and the contents will be developed in the form of seminars with various modules of complementary explorations. the assistance of these seminars is obligatory and an indispensable condition to be able to present in the examination of practical contents. in the event that the evolution of the health situation requires it, it will be sought to adapt the teaching activity and evaluation to the guidelines established by relevant agencies and will be informed of these adaptations to the moodle space of the subject.

original:
s'introdueixen components bàsics de
l'electrònica analògica: díodes, transistors i amplificadors operacionals.
s'estudien circuits amb aquests dispositius de manera teòrica i
experimentalment al laboratori.
translated_text:
basic components of
analog electronics: diodes, transistors and operational amplifiers.
circuits with these devices are studied theoretically and
experimentally in the laboratory.

original:
el curs de biomecànica 2 es centra a proporcionar els fonaments necessaris per al disseny de pròtesis i el càlcul de les càrregues sobre l'estructura biològica. a continuació, es resumeix el contingut del curs:
tema 1: fonaments i conceptes bàsics d'elasticitat aplicada a la biomecànica:introducció a la biomecànica i la seva aplicació en el disseny de pròtesis.conceptes bàsics d'elasticitat, com tensió, deformació i mòdul d'elasticitat.relació entre la mecànica dels materials i la biomecànica.
tema 2: el tensor de tensions:definició i representació del tensor de tensions.interpretació física dels components del tensor de tensions.càlcul de tensions principals i direccions principals.
tema 3: el tensor de deformacions:definició i representació del tensor de deformacions.interpretació física dels components del tensor de deformacions.càlcul de deformacions principals i direccions principals.
tema 4: equacions constitutives tensió-deformació:relació entre les tensions i les deformacions mitjançant equacions constitutives.tipus de materials i els seus comportaments elàstics.
tema 5: mètodes als elements finitos:introducció als mètodes d'elements finits en el disseny i anàlisi de pròtesis.modelatge i discretització d'estructures biomecàniques utilitzant elements finits.
tema 6: resolució del problema elàstic amb ansys:utilització del software ansys per resoldre problemes elàstics.aplicació de les tècniques d'elements finits en l'anàlisi de tensions i deformacions.en resum, el curs de biomecànica 2 abasta els fonaments d'elasticitat aplicada a la biomecànica, l'anàlisi de tensions i deformacions, així com l'ús de mètodes d'elements finits i el software ansys per al càlcul, disseny i anàlisi d'estructures biomecàniques.
translated_text:
the biomechanics 2 course focuses on providing the necessary foundations for the design of prostheses and the calculation of charges on biological structure. the content of the course is summarized below:
topic 1: fundamentals and basic concepts of elasticity applied to biomechanics: introduction to biomechanics and its application in the design of prostheses.basic concepts of elasticity, such as tension, deformation and modulus of elasticity.relation between the mechanics of materials and biomechanics.
subject 2: tension tensor:definition and representation of tension tensor. physical interpretation of tensor components of tensions.calculus of main tensions and principal directions.
subject 3: the tensor of deformations:definition and representation of the tensor of deformations. physical interpretation of the tensor components of deformations.calculus of principal deformations and principal directions.
topic 4: constitutive equations tension- deformation:relation between tensions and deformations by constitutive equations.type of materials and their elastic behaviors.
topic 5: methods to finite elements: introduction to finite element methods in the design and analysis of prostheses.modeling and discretization of biomechanical structures using finite elements.
subject 6: resolution of the elastic problem with ansys: utilization of the ansys software to solve elastic problems.application of finite element techniques in the analysis of stresses and deformations.in summary, the course of biomechanics 2 covers the foundations of elasticity applied to biomechanics, analysis of stresses and deformations, as well as the use of finite element methods and the ansys software for the calculation, design and analysis of biomechanical structures.
Error in translation request

original: establir els conceptes bàsics que permetin comprendre el funcionament dels éssers vius a nivell molecular.
translated_text: establishing the basic concepts that allow understanding the functioning of living things at the molecular level.

original: assignatura optativa que te per objectiu donar coneixements de disseny 3d i prototipatge. en referència al disseny 3d es veuran els moduls de disseny 3d general, el muntatge de peces, la parametritizació mitjançant les relacions entre variables i la creació de variables definides per l'usuari, el mòdul de plànols i el modul de xapa. en referència al prototipatge, es treballarà amb pràctiques tic i al laboratori realitzant tasques de fabricació aditiva i amb mecanitzat per mitjà de la fabricació assistida per ordinador i amb fabricació per tall làser.
translated_text: it is an optional subject that aims to give 3d design and prototyping knowledge. in reference to the 3d design, the general 3d design moduli, the assembly of pieces, the parameterization through the relationships between variables and the creation of variables defined by the user, the plane module and the sheet moduli. in reference to the prototype, it will be worked with tic practices and the laboratory performing additional manufacturing tasks and with mechanized by computer-assisted manufacturing and laser cutting.

original:
l'assignatura pretén aprofundir en els coneixements teòrics bàsics 
relacionats amb l'orientació de l'estudiant davant la seva formació 
acadèmica i la seva inserció laboral, acompanyant aquests coneixements 
d'experiències pràctiques.
translated_text:
the subject aims to deepen the basic theoretical knowledge
related to the orientation of the student before his training
academic and employment, accompanying these knowledge
of practical experiences.

original:
aquesta assignatura presenta el model de programació orientada a 
objectes i aprofundeix en les tècniques de programació estudiades en el 
curs anterior.
translated_text:
this subject presents the programming model oriented to
objects and deepens the programming techniques studied in the
previous year.

original: l'assignatura  estudia  l'arquitectura, programació, funcionament i aplicacions d'un microcontrolador de la família avr d'atmel i fa una introducció als sistemes encastats. es posarà molt èmfasi en el desenvolupament de programes i aplicacions al laboratori, a partir de l'entorn atmel studio i la placa atmega328p xplained mini.
translated_text: the subject studies the architecture, programming, functioning and applications of a microcontroller of the avr family of atmel and makes an introduction to embedded systems. it will put much emphasis on the development of programs and applications in the laboratory, from the atmel studio environment and the atmega328p xplained mini plate.

original: la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa.
translated_text: the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to face-to-face classes and can serve as an orientation guide.

original:
la informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes presencials i pot servir de guia orientativa. a causa de l’emergència sanitària provocada per la covid-19 poden haver-hi canvis en la docència, avaluació i calendaris del curs. aquests canvis s’informaran a l’espai moodle de cada assignatura. 

introducció als sistemes de comunicacions definint les seves parts 
bàsiques (transmissor, canal i receptor) i conceptes com: ampla de 
banda, potència transmesa, relació senyal a soroll, etc). estudi de les 
modulacions analògiques lineals: am, dbl, blu i blv i angulars fm i pm. 
anàlisi exhaustiu de conceptes de probabilitat i senyals aleatòries.

els idiomes en què s' impartirà l' assignatura seran català i castellà.
translated_text:
the information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to face-to-face classes and can serve as an orientation guide. due to the health emergency caused by covid-19 there may be changes in teaching, evaluation and course calendars. these changes will be informed in the moodle space of each subject.

introduction to communications systems defining their parts
basic (transmitter, channel and receiver) and concepts such as: wide
band, power transmitted, signal to noise ratio, etc.).
linear analog modulations: am, dbl, blu and blv and angular modulations fm and pm.
exhaustive analysis of probability concepts and random signals.

the languages in which the subject will be taught will be catalan and spanish.

original:
the
subject will generally be taught in catalan. the documentation can be in
catalan, spanish or english.

in
order to make an average in the final calculation of the subject grade, the
exam, practices and problems, and the integrative project must have a grade
equal to or higher than 4 and the overall grade of the subject must be equal or
greater than 5.

the
project will be done in groups but the evaluation is individual.

the
tests on the content of the subject will be carried out as this content is
taught and can be online. 

the
practices in the laboratory will be carried out in groups of 2 or exceptionally
3 students. a survey will be published through moodle to select the laboratory
groups. they will only be attended to in order of response and other academic
or work criteria will not be taken into account. laboratory groups have a
maximum number of students. 

2nd
call:

students
who have not submitted the project in the first call may do so in the second.

in
the second call, the exam and the integrative project will have to be recovered
separately, in the event that they have a grade lower than 4 in the first call.
in the case of recovering the integrative project, it will be necessary to
finish it without the help of the teacher. if the practice grade is lower than
4 in the first call, in the second call these will be evaluated with an exam.

in
the exams, you may not bring any kind of electronic device, only a scientific
calculator (non-programmable).

note:

in
this subject, the teaching will be done with inverse classes. in other words,
the theoretical classes will be held remotely and face-to-face will be used,
firstly, to reinforce the most complex theoretical concepts and, secondly, to
carry out the most practical classes.

original: que l’alumne adquireixi els coneixements essencials sobre les bases de fenomenologia biològica a partir dels principis de la física. analitzar els processos biològics com a combinació de fluxos i forces conjugats; i la bioenergètica associada en aquests processos.
translated_text: that the student acquires essential knowledge on the basis of biological phenomenology from the principles of physics. analyzing biological processes as a combination of flows and conjugate forces; and bioenergetics associated with these processes.

original:
conèixer i
comprendre els fonaments físics de la mecànica aplicables a l'enginyeria. la
informació publicada en aquesta guia és la que correspon a classes presencials
i pot servir de guia orientativa.

know and
understand the physical foundations of mechanics applicable to engineering. the national assembly
information published in this guide is the one that corresponds to face classes
and can serve as an guidance guide.
Error in translation request

original:
l'objectiu de l'assignatura és posar les bases dels fenòmens 
elèctrics, magnètics i òptics que es necessiten per a fonamentar les 
tècniques i aplicacions que es donaran en els graus d'enginyeria.
translated_text:
the aim of the subject is to lay the foundations of phenomena
electric, magnetic and optical that are needed to ground the
techniques and applications that will be given in engineering degrees.

original:
análisi idisseny lògic de circuits combinacionals i secuencials
estructura, disseny i funcionament de un processador
translated_text:
logical analysis and design of combinational and secuencial circuits
structure, design and operation of a processor

original: aquesta assignatura pretén sensibilitzar els estudiants envers a l'emprenedoria. es donaran a conèixer les habilitats i eines bàsiques per a poder dur a terme un projecte emprenedor propi.
translated_text: this subject aims to raise awareness of students towards entrepreneurship. the basic skills and tools to carry out an entrepreneurial project.

original: l’asignatura tractarà la gestió de dades, bases de dades relacionals, mineria de dades i algorismes basats en ia per analitzar grans volumen de dades. l'èmfasi es posarà en mysql com a eina per gestionar la base de dades relacional, i mapreduce i spark com a eines per analitzar big data i crear algorismes paral·lels que puguin processar grans quantitats de dades.els temes inclouen bases de dades relacionals, gestió d'emmagatzematge i memòria, conjunts d'elements freqüents i regles d'associació, cerca de veïns propers a dades d'alta dimensionalitat, hashing sensible a la localitat (lsh), reducció de la dimensionalitat, sistemes de recomanació, agrupació, anàlisi d'enllaços, aprenentatge automàtic supervisat a gran escala.
translated_text: the asignatura will treat data management, relational databases, data mining and ia-based algorithms to analyze large data volume. the emphasis will be placed on mysql as a tool to manage the relational database, and mapreduce and spark as tools to analyze big data and create parallel algorithms that can process large amounts of data. topics include relational databases, storage and memory management, sets of frequent elements and association rules, search for neighbors close to high-dimensionality data, locality sensitive hashing (lsh), dimensionality reduction, recommendation systems, grouping, link analysis, large-scale supervised machine learning.

original:
els objectius generals de 
l’assignatura son proporcionar a l'alumne els conceptes fonamentals de 
la química en l'àmbit de la biomedicina.
translated_text:
the general objectives of
the subject is to provide the student with the fundamental concepts of
chemistry in the field of biomedicine.

original:
curs bàsic de disseny electrònic digital. es fa un especial èmfasi en 
l'ús de llenguatge vhdl i la implementació de circuits digitals en 
dispositius programables.
translated_text:
basic course of digital electronic design. special emphasis is made
the use of vhdl language and the implementation of digital circuits in
programmable devices.

original:
en aquesta assignatura es presenten els principis fonamentals de la mecànica de fluids i dels fenòmens de transport mitjançant aplicacions biomèdiques, tant per modelitzar fluxos sanguinis com processos i equips utilitzats en la pràctica mèdica. 
although this course is not offered in english, foreign exchange students will receive personalised support in english and will be able to develop the evaluation activities in this language.
translated_text:
this subject presents the fundamental principles of fluid mechanics and transport phenomena through biomedical applications, both to model blood flows and processes and equipment used in medical practice.
although this course is not offered in english, foreign exchange students will receive personalized support in english and will be able to develop the evaluation activities in this language.

original:
introducció a l'anàlisi de dades obtingudes d'experiments biològics mitjançant eines estadístiques i el llenguatge r.
en aquesta assignatura les classes teòriques seran classes magistrals presencials. també seran presencials les classes de pràctiques.
translated_text:
introduction to data analysis obtained from biological experiments using statistical tools and the language r.
in this subject the theoretical classes will be master classes. practice classes will also be in person.

original: l’assignatura de biomecànica i és una assignatura obligatòria que té una càrrega lectiva de  3 crèdits ects. s'imparteix indistintament en català i castellà.
translated_text: the subject of biomechanics and is a compulsory subject with a collective charge of 3 ect credits. it is taught in catalan and spanish.

original: en aquesta assignatura revisarem conceptes bàsics relacionats a la instrumentació i al sensat de diferents magnituds físiques en general.
translated_text: in this subject we will review basic concepts related to instrumentation and sensing of different physical magnitudes in general.

original: aquesta assignatura pot virtualitzar-se total o parcialment, si és necessari, a causa del covid-19.
translated_text: this subject may be completely or partially virtualized, if necessary, due to covid-19.

estimular
  i facilitar el contacte de l'alumne amb el món laboral per complementar la

stimulate
and facilitate the contact of the student with the working world to complement the
its formation and facilitate its subsequent insertion
